title: com.apple.SafariTechnologyPreview.Developer
description: Developer options for the Safari Web Browser

IncludeDevelopMenu.title: Include Develop Menu
IncludeDevelopMenu.description: Sets availability of the Safari Developer menu

IncludeInternalDebugMenu.title: Include Debug Menu
IncludeInternalDebugMenu.description: Sets availability of the Safari internal debug menu

WebKitPreferences.developerExtrasEnabled.title: Enable Developer Extras
WebKitPreferences.developerExtrasEnabled.description: Sets whether to enable Developer extras

WebKitPreferences.diagnosticLoggingEnabl.title: Enable Diagnostic Logging
WebKitPreferences.diagnosticLoggingEnabl.description: Sets whether to enable diagnostic logging
